title: Education Accreditation Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of accreditation and quality assurance recognitions in education.

terms.label: Institutional Accreditation
terms.definition: Accreditation that applies to an entire institution, such as a college, university, or school.

terms.label: Programmatic Accreditation
terms.definition: Accreditation applied to specific programs, departments, or fields of study within an institution.

terms.label: Licensure or Regulatory Approval
terms.definition: Recognition by a licensing or regulatory body that a program or institution meets specific legal or professional standards.

terms.label: Quality Label or Endorsement
terms.definition: A quality label, ranking, or endorsement from a recognized organization that does not constitute formal accreditation or licensure.

terms.label: Other Accreditation Type
terms.definition: An accreditation or recognition type that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
